thread.section_title: ZipRecruiter Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ZipRecruiter | ziprecruiter.com | 19 of 189
thread.title: Lauren Kesler

author: Lauren Kesler
title: Lauren Kesler
text: I called yesterday to cancel my account and I spoke with a different gentleman who told me that the billing department would contact me within 24 hours but billing never called me. I called today and spoke with Les and he was able to take care of my account and truly went above and beyond. I hope that I always speak with Les because he is such a great help. I needed to cancel my account because Delaware North already has an account that I'm able to utilize instead of having an individual account.
